loading.failed: Your DMPs could not be loaded!

error.0: Service can not be reached, please retry later. If the issue persists contact [insert contact for technical issue].
error.404: The requested resource could not be found.
error.500: An error occurred, please contact [insert contact for technical issue].
error.503: Service is currently unavailable, please retry later.
error.openaire: Failed to get dataset information from OpenAIRE, please retry later.
error.document: An unexpected error occurred while generating your document. If the issue persists contact [insert contact for technical issue].

dashboard.welcome.message: Welcome to DAMAP, a service that helps you to create and update the Data Management Plan (DMP) for your project.

text.middle: is a structured document that keeps record of what research data is created and what happens to that data during and after a project. It helps with planning the research process, managing your data in accordance with the
text.suffix: , and defining rights and responsibilities in a research project involving several researchers or institutions.

dmp.text: guides you step by step through the different sections of a DMP following the

bulletpoints.document: exports a pre-filled DMP as a Word document that you can customize and use for submission to European and national funders, for example FWF and FFG

benefits.one: pre-filling content with detailed information from your CRIS application and other systems
benefits.two: providing wizards, guidance, and item lists to choose from
benefits.three: suggesting answers that you can either comply with or adjust to your needs

rda.text: RDA recommendation on machine actionable DMPs

env.title: Test environment
env.text: This application instance is for development and testing purposes only. Content may be deleted at any point in time without prior notification.
